owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

username.description: The handle for the GitHub user account.

permission.description: The permission to grant the collaborator. **Only valid on organization-owned repositories.** We accept the following permissions to be set: `pull`, `triage`, `push`, `maintain`, `admin` and you can also specify a custom repository role name, if the owning organization has defined any.
